Emilio Pucci.label: Emilio Pucci
Emilio Pucci.description: Emilio Pucci, Marchese di Barsento, was a Florentine Italian fashion designer and politician. He and his eponymous company are synonymous with geometric prints in a kaleidoscope of colours. Wikipedia

Ben de Lisi.label: Ben de Lisi
Ben de Lisi.description: Ben de Lisi is an American born fashion designer based in London. He is best known for his collections with high street store Debenhams, and as a mentor and judge on the television series Project Catwalk. Wikipedia

Charles Kleibacker.label: Charles Kleibacker
Charles Kleibacker.description: Charles John Kleibacker was an American fashion designer who earned the nickname "Master of the Bias" for the complex designs of his gowns for women, carefully cut from fabric at a diagonal to the weave. Wikipedia

Georgina Chapman.label: Georgina Chapman
Georgina Chapman.description: Georgina Rose Chapman is an English fashion designer and actress. Chapman, alongside Keren Craig, an actress and a former model, are the co-founders of fashion label Marchesa. Wikipedia

Irene Lentz.label: Irene
Irene Lentz.description: Irene Lentz, also known as Irene, was an American costume designer. Her work as a clothing designer in Los Angeles led to her career as a costume designer for films in the 1930s. Lentz also worked under the name Irene Gibbons. Wikipedia
Irene Lentz.Died: November 15, 1962, Los Angeles, California, United States
Awards: Costume Designers Guild Hall of Fame Award
Nominations: Academy Award for Best Costume Design
Academy Award for Best Costume Design

Jack Mackenroth.label: Jack Mackenroth
Jack Mackenroth.description: Jack Mackenroth is an American swimmer, model, and fashion designer who competed in the fourth season of American reality show Project Runway. Mackenroth was the first openly HIV-positive contestant in the show's history. Wikipedia
Education: Parsons The New School for Design

James Galanos.label: James Galanos
James Galanos.description: James Galanos is an American fashion designer, and is one the world's foremost 20th century couturiers. Wikipedia

John Varvatos.label: John Varvatos
John Varvatos.description: John Varvatos is an American contemporary menswear designer. Wikipedia

Nick Smith (milliner).label: Nick Smith
Nick Smith (milliner).description: Nick Smith is a British milliner, fashion designer and socialite. Wikipedia

Nick Verreos.label: Nick Verreos
Nick Verreos.description: Nick Verreos is an American fashion designer, fashion commentator and former Project Runway contestant. Wikipedia
Nick Verreos.Born: February 13, 1967 (age 47), St. Louis, Missouri, United States

Ralph Lauren.label: Ralph Lauren Corporation
Ralph Lauren.description: Ralph Lauren Corporation NYSE RL is a publicly traded, United States-based holding company that, through its subsidiaries, designs, markets and sells men's, women's and children's apparel, accessories, ... Wikipedia

Lucy, Lady Duff-Gordon.label: Lucy, Lady Duff-Gordon
Lucy, Lady Duff-Gordon.description: Lucy Christiana, Lady Duff-Gordon was a leading fashion designer in the late 19th and early 20th centuries, best known as "Lucile", her professional name. Wikipedia

Marcello Gandini.label: Marcello Gandini
Marcello Gandini.description: Marcello Gandini is an Italian car designer, known for his work with the automotive design house Gruppo Bertone, including his design of the Lamborghini Countach. Wikipedia

Nicolas Ghesquière.label: Nicolas Ghesquière
Nicolas Ghesquière.description: Nicolas Ghesquière is a fashion designer and is, currently, creative director of the house of Louis Vuitton owned by LVMH. Wikipedia

Christian Audigier.label: Christian Audigier
Christian Audigier.description: Christian Audigier, born on May 21, 1958 in Avignon, is a French fashion designer and entrepreneur, living in the United States. In 2010, his fortune was estimated at 250 million dollars. Wikipedia

Antonio Berardi.label: Antonio Berardi
Antonio Berardi.description: Antonio Berardi, is a British fashion designer of Sicilian descent, known especially for his dresses. He currently shows his collection at London fashion week, but has shown at Milan and Paris in the past. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Mary Katrantzou.label: Mary Katrantzou
Mary Katrantzou.description: Mary Katrantzou is a Greek fashion designer who currently lives and works in London. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Ralph Rucci.label: Ralph Rucci
Ralph Rucci.description: Ralph Rucci is an American fashion designer and artist. He is known in particular for Chado Ralph Rucci, a luxury clothing and accessories line. Wikipedia

Cesare Paciotti.label: Cesare Paciotti
Cesare Paciotti.description: Cesare Paciotti is a shoe designer from Italy. His eponymous company makes luxury shoes and other leather goods, including jewelry and watches, and is famous for its dagger logo. Wikipedia

Ferdinando Sarmi.label: Ferdinando Sarmi
Ferdinando Sarmi.description: Count Ferdinando Sarmi was the head of the Sarmi fashion design house in New York City. Wikipedia

Hussein Chalayan.label: Hussein Chalayan
Hussein Chalayan.description: Hussein Chalayan MBE is a British/Turkish Cypriot fashion designer. He has won the British Designer of the Year twice and was awarded the MBE in 2006. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Issey Miyake.label: Issey Miyake
Issey Miyake.description: Issey Miyake is a Japanese fashion designer. He is known for his technology-driven clothing designs, exhibitions and fragrances. Wikipedia

Stefano Pilati.label: Stefano Pilati
Stefano Pilati.description: Stefano Pilati is an Italian fashion designer. From 2002 until 2012, he was the head designer of the fashion house Yves Saint Laurent. In late 2012 he left and became creative director of AGNONA and head of design at Ermenegildo Zegna. Wikipedia

Jean-Charles de Castelbajac.label: Jean-Charles de Castelbajac
Jean-Charles de Castelbajac.description: Jean-Charles de Castelbajac, also known as JC/DC, born 28 November 1949 in Casablanca, Morocco, is a fashion designer. As the Marquis de Castelbajac, he is a French nobleman. Wikipedia

Lola Mora.label: Lola Mora
Lola Mora.description: Dolores Candelaria Mora Vega de Hernández or Dolores Mora Vega, known as Lola Mora, was a sculptor, born in a barn in the province of Salta, Argentina, though generally considered native to Trancas, ... Wikipedia
Lola Mora.Born: November 17, 1866, San Miguel de Tucumán, Argentina

Edward Molyneux.label: Edward Molyneux
Edward Molyneux.description: Edward Henry Molyneux was a British fashion designer whose fashion house in Paris was in operation from 1919 until 1950. Wikipedia

Halston.label: Halston
Halston.description: Roy Halston Frowick, known as Halston, was an American fashion designer of the 1970s. His long dresses or copies of his style were popular fashion wear in mid-1970s discotheques. Wikipedia
Halston.Born: April 23, 1932, Des Moines, Iowa, United States
Halston.Died: March 26, 1990, San Francisco, California, United States

Chris Liu.label: Chris Liu
Chris Liu.description: Chris Liu is a Chinese-born and London based fashion designer. Born in the cosmopolitan city of Urumqi in northwest China. Wikipedia

Michael Michalsky.label: Michael Michalsky
Michael Michalsky.description: Michael Michalsky is a German fashion designer. He is the founder and head designer of the fashion label Michalsky. He is also the creative director of the luxury handbag manufacturer MCM since 2005. Wikipedia

Claire Pettibone.label: Claire Pettibone
Claire Pettibone.description: Claire Pettibone is an American fashion designer based in Los Angeles. She is prominently known for her couture wedding gowns and intimate apparel, lifestyle collection. Wikipedia
Claire Pettibone.Born: May 23, 1967 (age 46), Los Angeles, California, United States
Education: Otis College of Art and Design

Mohsin Ali (fashion designer).label: Mohsin Ali
Mohsin Ali (fashion designer).description: Mohsin Ali is a Pakistani fashion designer. He belongs to the Hazara community and is from the city of Quetta in Balochistan. Wikipedia

Liz Claiborne (fashion designer).label: Liz Claiborne
Liz Claiborne (fashion designer).description: Anne Elisabeth Jane "Liz" Claiborne was a Belgian-born American fashion designer and entrepreneur. Claiborne is best known for co-founding Liz Claiborne Inc. which in 1986 became the first company founded by a woman to make the Fortune 500. Wikipedia
Liz Claiborne (fashion designer).Died: June 26, 2007, New York City, New York, United States

Luella Bartley.label: Luella Bartley
Luella Bartley.description: Luella Dayrell Bartley MBE is an English fashion designer, magazine editor and former journalist based in the UK. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Miuccia Prada.label: Miuccia Prada
Miuccia Prada.description: Miuccia Prada is the Italian fashion designer and entrepreneur behind Prada, known for its understated, minimalist, classic, cool, and comfortable luxury, and Miu Miu. Wikipedia

Nanette Lepore.label: Nanette Lepore
Nanette Lepore.description: Nanette Lepore is a well-known fashion designer based in New York City. New York magazine has said that "her gypsy-influenced designs are feminine and youthful. Wikipedia

Solange Azagury-Partridge.label: Solange Azagury-Partridge
Solange Azagury-Partridge.description: Solange Azagury-Partridge is a London based jewellery designer, the former Creative Director of Boucheron, and founder of her own brand. Wikipedia

Philipp Plein.label: Philipp Plein
Philipp Plein.description: Philipp Patrick Plein is a German fashion designer whose designs have incorporated a laughing skull which has become his signature. Wikipedia

Rei Kawakubo.label: Rei Kawakubo
Rei Kawakubo.description: Rei Kawakubo is a Japanese fashion designer, founder of Comme des Garçons. Wikipedia

Wilbert Das.label: Wilbert Das
Wilbert Das.description: Wilbert Das is a Dutch fashion designer. Wikipedia

Nicolas Felizola.label: Nicolas Felizola
Nicolas Felizola.description: Nicolas Felizola reminds you of a Renaissance artist, like a modern-day Leonardo da Vinci. He is a cultured lover of knowledge; a well rounded man who is in touch with all of his senses, both spiritually as well as intellectually. Wikipedia
Nicolas Felizola.Born: June 6, 1965 (age 48), Valle de la Pascua, Venezuela

Francisco Costa (designer).label: Francisco Costa
Francisco Costa (designer).description: Francisco Costa is the Women's Creative Director of Calvin Klein Collection. Costa won the Council of Fashion Designers America award for Womenswear Designer of the Year in June 2006 as well as in June 2008. Wikipedia

Isabel Toledo.label: Isabel Toledo
Isabel Toledo.description: Isabel Toledo is a Cuban-American fashion designer based in New York. Wikipedia
Education: Parsons The New School for Design

Oscar de la Renta.label: Oscar de la Renta
Oscar de la Renta.description: Óscar Arístides Ortiz de la Renta Fiallo ], Dominican American fashion designer. Born in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic, De la Renta was trained by Cristóbal Balenciaga and Antonio Castillo, he became ... Wikipedia
Education: Real Academia de Bellas Artes de San Fernando

Marc Ecko.label: Marc Ecko
Marc Ecko.description: Marc Eckō is an American fashion designer, entrepreneur, investor, artist, and philanthropist. He is the founder and Chief Creative Officer of Marc Eckō Enterprises, a billion-dollar global fashion and lifestyle company. Wikipedia
Marc Ecko.Born: August 29, 1972 (age 41), Livingston, New Jersey, United States

Alexander Wang (designer).label: Alexander Wang
Alexander Wang (designer).description:
Alexander Wang is an American fashion designer and Creative Director of Balenciaga.
At age 18, he moved to New York City to attend Parsons. Wikipedia
Education: Parsons The New School for Design

Andrew Groves.label: Andrew Groves
Andrew Groves.description: Andrew Groves is a London-based English fashion designer specialising in womenswear, menswear and prints. He is currently Course Director for BA Fashion Design at the University of Westminster, where he has lectured since 2001. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Bijan (designer).label: Bijan
Bijan (designer).description: Bijan Pakzad, generally known simply as bijan, was an Iranian designer of menswear and fragrances. Wikipedia

Derek Lam.label: Derek Lam
Derek Lam.description: Derek Lam is an American fashion designer. He was born in San Francisco, California and is of Chinese American parentage. Lam is the youngest of three children in his fourth-generation family. Wikipedia
Education: Parsons The New School for Design

Paul Zastupnevich.label: Paul Zastupnevich
Paul Zastupnevich.description: Paul Zastupnevich was an American costume designer and assistant to movie producer and director Irwin Allen. Wikipedia

Nominations: Academy Award for Best Costume Design

Phillip Lim.label: Phillip Lim
Phillip Lim.description: Phillip Lim is an American fashion designer of Chinese descent. Lim co-founded and worked at the Los Angeles based fashion label Development from 2000 to 2004. Wikipedia

Shawna Trpcic.label: Shawna Trpcic
Shawna Trpcic.description: Shawna Trpcic is a Hollywood costume designer. She got her start in the industry with the 1990 film Megaville, and went on to work as a wardrobe assistant on the films Toys and Red Shoe Diaries. Wikipedia

Carolina Bucci.label: Carolina Bucci
Carolina Bucci.description: Carolina Bucci is an Italian jewellery designer whose creations are synonymous with a modern and effortless sense of luxury. Wikipedia

David Shilling.label: David Shilling
David Shilling.description: David Shilling is an English milliner, sculpturer, fashion and interior designer synonymous with designing extravagant hats and clothing displayed on Ladies' Day at Royal Ascot. Wikipedia

Lubov Azria.label: Lubov Azria
Lubov Azria.description: Lubov Azria is an American fashion designer. Azria is the Chief Creative Officer of BCBG Max Azria Group, a global fashion house with over 20 brands. Wikipedia

Anya Hindmarch.label: Anya Hindmarch
Anya Hindmarch.description: Anya Susannah Hindmarch MBE is an English fashion accessories designer. Wikipedia

Abigail Keats.label: Abigail Keats
Abigail Keats.description: Abigail Keats is a South African fashion designer. Wikipedia

Gints Bude.label: Gints Bude
Gints Bude.description: Gints Bude is a Latvian fashion designer and an expert of clothing and dress code. Wikipedia

Jenny Packham.label: Jenny Packham
Jenny Packham.description: Jenny Packham is a British fashion designer known primarily for her bridal gowns and ready-to-wear collections. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Joseph Altuzarra.label: Joseph Altuzarra
Joseph Altuzarra.description: Joseph Altuzarra is a luxury women's ready-to-wear clothing designer. He launched his brand, Altuzarra, in New York in 2008. His brand is influenced by his multicultural upbringing and his international education in fashion. Wikipedia

Kristian Aadnevik.label: Kristian Aadnevik
Kristian Aadnevik.description: Kristian Aadnevik is a London-based Norwegian fashion designer, who graduated from Royal College of Art in 2002. Wikipedia

Jeff Banks.label: Jeff Banks
Jeff Banks.description: Jeff Banks CBE is a Welsh designer of men's and women's clothing, jewellery, and home furnishings. Born in Ebbw Vale, Wales, Banks co-founded the fashion chain Warehouse in the late 1970s. Wikipedia

Rohit Khosla.label: Rohit Khosla
Rohit Khosla.description: Rohit Khosla, was a pioneer of Indian fashion. He started his own label in 1987, along with his sister, designer, Rohini Khosla. Wikipedia

Sruli Recht.label: Sruli Recht
Sruli Recht.description:
Sruli Recht is a Designer and Artist based in Reykjavík, Iceland. He was born in Jerusalem, Israel and holds Australian and Icelandic citizenship.
Recht studied Fashion Design at RMIT University in Melbourne Australia. Wikipedia

Timothy Everest.label: Timothy Everest
Timothy Everest.description: Timothy Everest, MBE is a Welsh bespoke tailor and designer who has, according to Vogue, "dressed some of the world's most famous people". Wikipedia

Amir Slama.label: Amir Slama
Amir Slama.description: Amir Slama is a Brazilian-born fashion designer. He was the designer, stylist and owner of the Brazilian beach fashion brand Rosa Chá.Now run a brand under his name, Amir Slama, with stores in Sao Paulo ... Wikipedia

Elvis Pompilio.label: Elvis Pompilio
Elvis Pompilio.description: Elvis Pompilio is a Belgian fashion designer who specialises in hats. He was born in Liège to a family of Italian origin. Wikipedia

Agnimitra Paul.label: Agnimitra Paul
Agnimitra Paul.description: Agnimitra Paul is an Indian fashion designer. Wikipedia

Fátima Lopes.label: Fátima Lopes
Fátima Lopes.description:
Fátima Lopes, ComIH is a Portuguese fashion designer.
Fátima comes from the Portuguese island of Madeira. She was born and grew up in its capital city, Funchal. Wikipedia

Hassan Sheheryar Yasin.label: Hassan Sheheryar Yasin
Hassan Sheheryar Yasin.description:
Hassan Sheheryar Yasin, simply known as H S Y, is a Pakistani fashion designer.
A salutatorian graduate of the Pakistan School of Fashion Design, Yasin is affiliated with the La Chambre Syndicale De La Couture Parisienne in France. Wikipedia
Awards: Lux Style Award for Achievement in Design (menswear)
Lux Style Award for Red Carpet Best Dressed Male Celeb
Nominations: Lux Style Award for Best Menswear Designer
Lux Style Award for Achievement in Design (bridal wear)
Lux Style Award for Achievement in Fashion Design – CoutureMore

Mustafa Hassanali.label: Mustafa Hassanali
Mustafa Hassanali.description:
Mustafa Hassanali is a Tanzanian fashion designer and a qualified doctor.
Hassanali's collections have been shown widely throughout Africa and Italy. His work features detailed beadwork and embellishments. Wikipedia

Rehane Yavar Dhala.label: Rehane Yavar Dhala
Rehane Yavar Dhala.description: Begum Rehane Yavar Dhala née Begum Rehane Khaleeli, best known as REHANE, is a fashion designer based in Chennai, India and known for her mélange of modern Indian sensibilities with a strong sense of European haute couture and ready-to-wear fashion. Wikipedia

Sabyasachi Mukherjee.label: Sabyasachi Mukherji
Sabyasachi Mukherjee.description: Sabyasachi Mukherjee is a noted Indian fashion designer from Kolkata. Since 1999, he sells designer merchandise using label 'Sabyasachi'. Wikipedia
Awards: National Film Award for Best Costume Design
Nominations: Star Guild Award for Best Costume Design

Clare Potter.label: Clare Potter
Clare Potter.description: Clare Potter was a fashion designer who was born in Jersey City, New Jersey in 1903. In the 1930s she was one of the first American fashion designers to be promoted as an individual design talent. Wikipedia
Clare Potter.Born: July 7, 1903, Jersey City, New Jersey, United States
Clare Potter.Died: January 5, 1999, Fort Ann, New York, United States
Education: Art Students League of New York

Lloyd Klein.label: Lloyd Klein
Lloyd Klein.description: Lloyd Klein is a French couturier born in Canada and currently based in Los Angeles. Wikipedia

Vince Camuto.label: Vince Camuto
Vince Camuto.description: Vince Camuto is an American women’s footwear designer who is known for co-founding the women's fashion brand Nine West. As of 2013, he is CEO/Chief Creative Officer of the fashion company Camuto Group, Wikipedia

Yohji Yamamoto.label: Yohji Yamamoto
Yohji Yamamoto.description: Yōji Yamamoto is an award winning and influential Japanese fashion designer based in Tokyo and Paris. Wikipedia

Carla Zampatti.label: Carla Zampatti
Carla Zampatti.description:
Carla Maria Zampatti AC is an Italian-Australian fashion designer and businesswoman.
Carla Zampatti is Executive Chairman of Carla Zampatti Pty Limited. Wikipedia

Isaac Mizrahi.label: Isaac Mizrahi
Isaac Mizrahi.description: Isaac Mizrahi is an American fashion designer, TV presenter, and creative director of Xcel Brands. He is best known for his eponymous fashion lines. Wikipedia
Isaac Mizrahi.Born: October 14, 1961 (age 52), Brooklyn, New York, United States
Education: Parsons The New School for Design

Yves Saint Laurent (designer).label: Yves Saint Laurent
Yves Saint Laurent (designer).description: Yves Henri Donat Mathieu-Saint-Laurent, known as Yves Saint Laurent, was a French fashion designer, and is regarded as one of the greatest names in fashion history. Wikipedia

Torsten Amft.label: Torsten Amft
Torsten Amft.description: Torsten Amft is a German fashion designer and artist. Wikipedia

Wolfgang Joop.label: Wolfgang Joop
Wolfgang Joop.description: Wolfgang Joop is a German fashion designer. He is the founder of the fashion and cosmetics company JOOP!, and father of fashion designer Jette Joop. Wikipedia

Carolina Herrera (fashion designer).label: Carolina Herrera
Carolina Herrera (fashion designer).description: Carolina Herrera is a Venezuelan-American fashion designer known for "exceptional personal style", and dressing First Ladies from Jacqueline Onassis to Michelle Obama. Wikipedia

Anand Kabra.label: Anand Kabra
Anand Kabra.description: Anand Kabra is an Indian fashion designer. He is known for his sari designs. Wikipedia

Damaris Evans.label: Damaris Evans
Damaris Evans.description: Damaris Alice Turle Evans is a British fashion designer and creative director and owner of demi-couture lingerie labels Damaris and Mimi Holliday. Wikipedia
Education: Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design

Christophe Josse.label: Christophe Josse
Christophe Josse.description: Christophe Josse is a French fashion designer and an haute couture fashion brand. Wikipedia

Atıl Kutoğlu.label: Atıl Kutoğlu
Atıl Kutoğlu.description: Atıl Kutoğlu is a Turkish fashion designer residing in Vienna. Kutoğlu launched his clothing label in 1992 which uses Turkish influences and culture and presents them in a modern way. Wikipedia

Stevie Boi.label: Stevie Boi
Stevie Boi.description: Stevie Boi is an American fashion designer and founder of the luxury eyewear line SB Shades. He currently resides in Baltimore. He designs and sells unisex eyewear and accessories on his website and in a few boutique stores. Wikipedia

Stéphane Rolland.label: Stéphane Rolland
Stéphane Rolland.description: Stéphane Rolland is a French fashion designer and an haute couture fashion brand. Wikipedia

Ray Petri.label: Ray Petri
Ray Petri.description:
Ray Petri was a fashion stylist and creator of the fashion house, Buffalo.
Born Ray Petrie in Dundee, Scotland, Petri moved to Brisbane, Australia with his family at age 15. Wikipedia

Rabih Kayrouz.label: Rabih Kayrouz
Rabih Kayrouz.description: Rabih Kayrouz is a Lebanese fashion designer, creator and founder of the fashion house Maison Rabih Kayrouz, established in Paris in 2008. Wikipedia
